availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George William Marshall (Covington, Kentucky, master carpenter.)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, master carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Ann Eliza McDonnold in Kenton County on October 22, 1856. Father of Anna Marshall and Mary Marshall. Carpenter in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1850. Master carpenter in Covington, Kenton County, in 1860. Employed Elizabeth Fury as a servant in Covington, Kenton County, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States(1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 2, p. 189B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 687.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994043, Kenton County Marriages.
